'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a {{lc:Quest item}} in {{poe2}}.
__NOTOC__

##  Description 

{{Description |{{#var:description}}}}

##  Acquisition 

{{#arraymap: {{#var:location}}|;|x|x|\n}}

## Usage

* During the quest [Burning Bridges](/burningBridges/), the carving can be traded with [Mokeha](/mokeha/) in exchange for [Rinco's Coin Purse](/rincosCoinPurse/).

## Trivia

* Eofania says that the carvings come from Neketaka, where they are churned out in bulk.
